mapper.select: select x.*,y.QYNO,y.ORMTQT_BW_QY ,'${bradno}' bradno ,'${spclno}' spclno,'${ormtno}' ormtno from ( select c.SAMPNO,c.sampnm,e.SUITNO,d.sptyno,d.spseno from ord_sample_design c inner join ord_sample_plan d on c.plspno=d.plspno inner join ord_sample_design_sizegp E on c.sampno=e.sampno WHERE d.ormtno=#{ormtno} ) x left join ( select SAMPNO,QYNO,SUITNO,sum(ORMTQT_BW_QY) ORMTQT_BW_QY FROM( select B.SAMPNO,a.ordorg as QYNO,B.SUITNO,sum(b.ORMTQT) ORMTQT_BW_QY from ORD_ORD A inner join ORD_ORDDTL B on A.mtorno=B.mtorno inner join (SELECT DISTINCT QYNO FROM V_ORD_ORG WHERE YXGSNO=#{yxgsno}) C on A.ORDORG=C.QYNO WHERE A.ORMTNO=#{ormtno} and A.ORTYNO='BW' and a.channo='QY' GROUP BY B.SAMPNO,a.ordorg,B.SUITNO ) GROUP BY SAMPNO,QYNO,SUITNO ) y on x.SAMPNO=y.SAMPNO and x.suitno=y.suitno order by x.SAMPNO,x.suitno,y.QYNO
